Description: HAMER SLAMMER Electric Guitar w/ Schaller Floyd Rose Tremolo An excellent Hamer Slammer Electric Guitar!!! It has a beautiful vintage Sunburst finish, a 24 fret Rosewood fretboard with offset dot inlays, black hardware, and a genuine Schaller Floyd Rose locking tremolo(includes a gold whammy bar). It has 3 pickups that sound great!(2 original single coils and what appears to be a white Dimarzio humbucker, super dist I believe). It is 25.5 scale and the nut width is 1 5/8", and it weighs 7.2 pounds. The condition is very good to excellent(an 8.8 out of 10) with light signs of use and shows just slight fret wear, the guitar is really nice all around with no problems except for light scratches and dings(See pics). Serial#37565, made in Korea, not sure of the year probably late 1980's, no case. 　 USA Shipping, handling, and insurance charge will be $50 in USPS's deliverable USA 48 states.
